title: Find Rolan in the Shadows
content: r he will be attacked by 2 shadows regardless of whether you enter combat. Once near make your way down to him quickly in order to save him from the shadows as he will only survive a few turns by himself. The shadows should be relatively trivial by themselves if you have already managed to rescue his siblings at this point but they can disappear and reappear so make sure you stay near Rolan to better keep him alive. Once dealt with you can talk to Rolan and he will return to the inn (still think
